mapper.select: select companymember.id,member.name,member.nickname,companymember.corporate_registration_number,member.tel,companymember.approval from member member,companymember companymember where member.id=companymember.id and companymember.approval = 0

select companymember.id,member.name,member.nickname,companymember.corporate_registration_number,member.tel,companymember.approval from member member,companymember companymember where member.id=companymember.id and companymember.approval = 1
mapper.update: update companymember set approval = approval+1 where id=#{value}
